title: 483. No Such Thing As Rivets On A Tombstone
content:
Dan, James, Andrew and Ella Al-Shamahi discuss hops, hominids, Spitfires and Socotra.

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.
